MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the TD9 postcode area of Galashiels. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 7.42pm. Our engineers are on their way to the local area to investigate the cause of the fault and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10:45PM. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:08PM on Sunday 03 January 2021.
